short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See your Unread Baemail Inbox Before Anything Else in your regular Gmail inbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For Baemail users with MoneyButton paymails.
Baemail allows you to value order your encrypted messages. This extension will simply show you if you have any unread Baemails in a convenient place right next to your regular emails. To install, please add the extension and then navigate to mail.google.com where you will see after a few seconds delay that a MoneyButton loads for your to sign in with. The login is required only to retrieve messages from your inbox, and clicking the messages will link you to the full content so you can reply.
